name: Egg Catch
description:
Egg Catch

This cute 2D minigame mimics gameplay Chansey's Egg Catch from Pokemon Stadium 2. All you have to do is dodge the beehives and collect the eggs. Try to get the special golden eggs when they appear, and try to keep up!

Github Link:

Click the link below to find the project files on GitHub.

Github project link
